org.richfaces.fragment.contextMenu

Class AbstractPopupMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.richfaces.fragment.contextMenu.AbstractPopupMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdvancedInteractions<AbstractPopupMenu.AdvancedPopupMenuInteractions>, AdvancedVisibleComponentIteractions<AbstractPopupMenu.AdvancedPopupMenuInteractions>, PopupMenu, PopupMenuGroup
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RichFacesContextMenu, RichFacesDropDownMenu

    public abstract class AbstractPopupMenu
extends Object
implements PopupMenu, AdvancedVisibleComponentIteractions<AbstractPopupMenu.AdvancedPopupMenuInteractions>
    Author:
    Juraj Huska

      • expandGroup

        public PopupMenuGroup expandGroup(ChoicePicker picker,
                         org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
        Description copied from interface: PopupMenu
        Expands group from this menu, which satisfies the rules given in picker param. Opens menu, if it is not visible.
        Specified by:
        expandGroup in interface PopupMenu
        Parameters:
        picker - object to define which group should be expanded
        target - for defining the popup menu which will be invoked and from which the item will be selected
        Returns:
        the group which was expanded

      • selectItem

        public void selectItem(ChoicePicker picker)
        Description copied from interface: PopupMenuGroup
        Selects the menu item from this menu or menu group according to the rules defined in the picker param. Opens menu or sub menu from visible menu, if it is not visible.
        Specified by:
        selectItem in interface PopupMenuGroup
        Parameters:
        picker - for defining the rules by which the item will be selected

      • selectItem

        public void selectItem(String header)
        Description copied from interface: PopupMenuGroup
        Selects the menu item from this menu or menu group according to the exact match of its text representation with passed header param. Opens menu or sub menu from visible menu, if it is not visible.
        Specified by:
        selectItem in interface PopupMenuGroup
        Parameters:
        header - text representation of the menu item to be selected

      • selectItem

        public void selectItem(int index)
        Description copied from interface: PopupMenuGroup
        Selects the menu item from this menu or menu group according to its index in the list of all menu items. Opens menu or sub menu from visible menu, if it is not visible. Items are indexed from 0. A top menu item (the one which is the closest to the root of the popup menu component) has index 0.
        Specified by:
        selectItem in interface PopupMenuGroup
        Parameters:
        index - zero based index of the item to be selected

      • selectItem

              org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
        Description copied from interface: PopupMenu
        Selects the menu item from this menu or sub menu according to the rules defined in the picker param. Opens menu, if it is not visible.
        Specified by:
        selectItem in interface PopupMenu
        Parameters:

        target - for defining the popup menu which will be invoked and from which the item will be selected

      • selectItem

        public void selectItem(int index,
              org.openqa.selenium.WebElement target)
        Description copied from interface: PopupMenu
        Selects the menu item from this menu according to its index in the list of all menu items. Opens menu, if it is not visible. Items are indexed from 0. A top menu item (the one which is the closest to the root of the popup menu component) has index 0.
        Specified by:
        selectItem in interface PopupMenu
        Parameters:
        index - zero based index of the item to be selected
